refnamediv.refpurpose: Dumps the Palm Address Book entries to STDOUT in a generic text output format.

refsect1.title: Section
refsect1.para: pilot-link: Conduits

refsect1.title: Synopsis
refsect1.para: Output to STDOUT (the screen):
addresses [-p|--port <port>] [--version] [-q|--quiet] [-?|--help] [--usage]

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: addresses will connect to your Palm handheld and dump all entries found in the AddressDB.pdb (Address Book) file to STDOUT (screen output) or to a file using standard redirects.
> (greater-than) to create a new file or replace an existing file.
>> to append to an existing file without losing existing data.

refsect1.title: command
refsect1.para: -p, --port <port>

blockquote.para: Use device file <port> to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, addresses will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable. If neither are found, addresses will fall back to /dev/pilot.

refsect1.title: options

blockquote.para: Display the copyright information,version number, licence details and build details and exit without connecting.

refsect1.para: -q, --quiet
-?, --help

blockquote.para: Show the help message and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: Like other programs, STDOUT can be redirected to a specified output file using the standard redirect commands:
refsect1.programlisting: Create a new file (empty it first if it already exists): addresses [--p <port>] > MyAddresses.txt (Note the redirect) ^
Append to an existing file (create it if it does not exist): addresses [--p <port>] >> MyAddresses.txt (Note the redirect) ^^
refsect1.para: This will dump the Address Book from your Palm into the file MyAddresses.txt in the format that looks similar to the following format:
refsect1.programlisting: Category: Personal Businesses Last name: Doe First name: Jane Company: Acme, Inc. Work: +1 (800) GO-ACME Home: jdoe@acme.org Address: 123 Main Street City: Anywhere State: CA Zip Code: 01234-5678 Country: USA Title: Chief Annoyance Officer
refsect1.para: The output of addresses can be piped to any other command to limit the output. To only list LastName, FirstName and Company of all listed at the company "Acme, Inc.":
The accuracy of this filter depends on how consistently you have entered the company name - missing or added punctuation will require some extra options in the grep command.
